title: Need help!
body:
Hey, I'm having a massive problem and have for a very long time. In game, i can be playing normally and then all of a sudden i will start lagging extremely hard. I check my internet, and nothing is wrong. I check all my settings and diagnostics, and nothing is out of the ordinary. My in game ping stays at a steady 47-48 m/s. The problem has gotten to the point where I can type or use an ability and not see it happen for upwards of 2 minutes in game.
If anyone has any thoughts or suggestions to help, i would love to hear them because this has made League practically impossible for me to play at this point. Thank you!{{champion:85}}

replies.body: Hmmmm, with only this context, this does sound like traditional lag/packet loss. Personally, I'd recommend going through our [**CONNECTION GUIDE**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664), but if the issues still persist, feel free to hit me up in a [**Tech Support Ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
